fields.name: ActionName
fields.description: Name of action recommended by this object.

fields.name: BladeName
fields.description: Deep link to a blade on the portal.

fields.name: CategoryTags
fields.description: The list of category tags that this recommendation belongs to.

fields.name: Channels
fields.description: List of channels that this recommendation can apply.

fields.name: CreationTime
fields.description: Timestamp when this instance was created.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: UI friendly name of the rule (may not be unique).

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: True if this recommendation is still valid (i.e. "actionable"). False if it is invalid.

fields.name: EndTime
fields.description: The end time in UTC of a range that the recommendation refers to.

fields.name: ExtensionName
fields.description: Extension name of the portal if exists.

fields.name: ForwardLink
fields.description: Forward link to an external document associated with the rule.

fields.name: IsDynamic
fields.description: True if this is associated with a dynamically added rule

fields.name: Level
fields.description: Level indicating how critical this recommendation can impact.

fields.name: Message
fields.description: Recommendation text.

fields.name: NextNotificationTime
fields.description: When to notify this recommendation next in UTC. Null means that this will never be notified anymore.

fields.name: NotificationExpirationTime
fields.description: Date and time in UTC when this notification expires.

fields.name: NotifiedTime
fields.description: Last timestamp in UTC this instance was actually notified. Null means that this recommendation hasn't been notified yet.

fields.name: RecommendationId
fields.description: A GUID value that each recommendation object is associated with.

fields.name: ResourceId
fields.description: Full ARM resource ID string that this recommendation object is associated with.

fields.name: ResourceScope
fields.description: Name of a resource type this recommendation applies, e.g. Subscription, ServerFarm, Site.

fields.name: RuleName
fields.description: Unique name of the rule.

fields.name: Score
fields.description: A metric value measured by the rule.

fields.name: StartTime
fields.description: The beginning time in UTC of a range that the recommendation refers to.

fields.name: States
fields.description: The list of states of this recommendation. If it's null then it should be considered "Active".
